EmailTemplate.description: Notify Approver 3 of application to review
EmailTemplate.name: 9Notify Approver 3 of application to review
EmailTemplate.subject: DTW Action Required: Deliver to Win enrollment application submitted for your approval
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
A Deliver to Win Enrollment Application has been submitted which requires your approval. The following exceptions have been requested:
Insert list of exceptions requiring third level approval
Please click the link below review to confirm plan selection (fixed price or T&M), baseline gross margin and DSO targets, and confirm participants/target awards.
{!EnrollmentPlan__c.Link}
For more information please review the Approver Resources on the DTW webpage. A short video and more information about the plan are available.
Thank you,
DTW Administrator
{!EnrollmentPlan__c.ReplyTo__c}
